titles.title: Native Hawaiian Education Reauthorization Act
To amend the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to improve Native Hawaiian education programs, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Education Reform.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

bill.summary: 3/27/2001--Introduced. Native Hawaiian Education Reauthorization Act - Amends the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to: (1) reauthorize appropriations for Native Hawaiian Education; and (2) replace a series of categorical programs serving Native Hawaiian children and adults with a single authority for the Secretary of Education to assist such program activities.
